dcterms:creator: M. Defferrard
K. Benzi
P. Vandergheynst
X. Bresson
dcterms:description: An open and easily accessible dataset suitable for evaluating several tasks in music information retrieval (MIR). It consists of full-length and high-quality audio tracks, including metadata, with a total of 106,574 tracks from 16,341 artists and 14,854 albums, arranged in a hierarchical taxonomy of 161 genres.
dcterms:title: Free Music Archive Dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Ardila
M. Branson
K. Davis
M. Henretty
M. Kohler
J. Meyer
R. Morais
L. Saunders
F. M. Tyers
G. Weber
dcterms:description: A massively-multilingual speech corpus consisting of about 51,000 voice recording samples in 18 different languages, used for inferring user demographics such as age, gender, and race.
dcterms:title: Mozilla Common Voice Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. R. Livingstone
F. A. Russo
dcterms:description: A dynamic, multimodal set of facial and vocal expressions in North American English, consisting of 7356 audio samples of 12 female and 12 male professional actors, used for inferring emotional content.
dcterms:title: Ryerson Audio-Visual Database of Emotional Speech and Song (RAVDESS)
